sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnvcatnmanage ( applcnt_id , vcatn_se , bgnde , endde , vcatn_resn , reqst_de , occrrnc_year , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , noon_se ) VALUES ( #applcntId# , #vcatnSe# , #bgnde# , #endde# , #vcatnResn# , #reqstDe# , #occrrncYear# , #sanctnerId# , #confmAt# , #sanctnDt# , #returnResn# , #infrmlSanctnId# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #noonSe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnvcatnmanage SET applcnt_id = #applcntId# , vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# , bgnde = #bgnde# , endde = #endde# , vcatn_resn = #vcatnResn# , reqst_de = #reqstDe# , occrrnc_year = #occrrncYear# , sanctner_id = #sanctnerId# , confm_at = #confmAt# , sanctn_dt = #sanctnDt# , return_resn = #returnResn# , infrml_sanctn_id = #infrmlSanctnId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , noon_se = #noonSe# WHERE 1 = 1 AND applcnt_id = #applcntId# AND vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# AND bgnde = #bgnde# AND endde = #endde#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnvcatnmanage WHERE 1 = 1 AND applcnt_id = #applcntId# AND vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# AND bgnde = #bgnde# AND endde = #endde#
sqlMap.select: SELECT applcnt_id , vcatn_se , bgnde , endde , vcatn_resn , reqst_de , occrrnc_year , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , noon_se FROM COMTNVCATNMANAGE WHERE applcnt_id = #applcntId# AND vcatn_se = #vcatnSe# AND bgnde = #bgnde# AND endde = #endde#

SELECT A.APPLCNT_ID , A.VCATN_SE , A.BGNDE , A.ENDDE , A.VCATN_RESN , A.REQST_DE , A.OCCRRNC_YEAR , A.SANCTNER_ID , A.CONFM_AT , A.SANCTN_DT , A.RETURN_RESN , A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.NOON_SE FROM ( SELECT APPLCNT_ID , VCATN_SE , BGNDE , ENDDE , VCATN_RESN , REQST_DE , OCCRRNC_YEAR , SANCTNER_ID , CONFM_AT , SANCTN_DT , RETURN_RESN , INFRML_SANCTN_ID , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , NOON_SE , ROWNUM FROM COMTNVCATNMANAGE WHERE 1=1
APPLCNT_ID = #searchKeyword#
VCATN_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY APPLCNT_ID DESC , VCATN_SE DESC , BGNDE DESC , ENDDE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNVCATNMANAGE WHERE 1=1
APPLCNT_ID = #searchKeyword#
VCATN_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
